casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gary LAWRENCE. No. 457PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 12, 2005. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of July 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Lawrence) shall have up to and including the 29th day of August 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of July 2005."
